question: 信奉
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Dedicate</kanji> your life to what you <kanji>believe</kanji> in and you'll have really strong <vocabulary>belief</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>faith</vocabulary> in whatever that thing is. Just try to dedicate yourself to something nice.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
